description:
Built on a creamy tomato-based sauce, this fusilli pasta is brought to life with fresh basil, ripe parmesan, and savoury Romano cheese.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: pasta (wheat), tomato powder, Romano cheese powder (Romano cheese [milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), shredded monterey jack cheese (milk, salt, enzymes, potato starch), parmesan cheese powder (parmesan cheese [partially skimmed milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), textured soy flour, potato starch, tomato flakes, sugar, onion, red and green bell peppers, modified milk ingredients, dried garlic, sea salt, milk ingredients, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), and spices
  • Allergens - contains: milk, wheat, and soy
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Tuscan Style Pasta Roma
